Articles.Content:
Is there a way to move the navball?  It always seems to be in my way.

I installed enhanced navball but I cant seem to find the menu to move the navball around.

Perhaps its conflicting with NavBallDockingAlignmentIndicator ?

When you're in flight, pause the game, click settings, and scroll down to flightUI Elements and you'll see two options to control the size and position of the navball. You'll want to play around with those to your liking.
This question about how to play the game has been moved to Gameplay Questions.
